HomePage.AreaDescription: These mods have been hand-picked by the developers of tModLoader, and are intended to shine the spotlight on high quality, but perhaps lesser-known Terraria mods.

General.WorkshopDescription: View and download tModLoader Mods from the Steam Workshop. Please note that the mods listed here are only usable on the default tModLoader branch. Mods usable on 1.3-legacy are found elsewhere.

StorePage.ShortDescription: Dig, Fight, and Build your way through the world of player-created mods on Terraria with tModLoader - this DLC makes modding Terraria a reality!
